modName: Dracos Master Healer Paladin restoration and lesser powers and spells pack
summary:
My mod that adds lesser powers, heal spells and more restoration spell. Can be purchased from Colette Marence in the college of winterhold.

Please help me balance this mod let me know if a spell heals to much or not enough and or cost to much or not enough.

Nice feature is you can use lesser power spells with a shield and sword as a shout pow
descriptionHtml:
1.2 Changed vendor from urag to Colette Marence to make mod more compatible. Message me if I forgot a spell I think I got them all and I cleaned the esp so should be good to go.

1.1 update increased healing of prayer lesser power my game had a active that was making it look strong in game but once I fixed it, it was way to weak.



This mod adds spell tomes to Colette Marence in the college of winterhold library new in version 1.2. 

Please help me balance this mod let me know if a spell heals to much or not enough and or cost to much or not enough.

Spell list Not complete. (Just what I can remember offhand)

LESSER POWERS                                 
Healing Prayer Lesser                              
Healing Prayer Stronger                 
Healing wave (Blasts undead)              
Healing Elemental Cloaks               
Healing Storm Cloak                         
Healing Flame Cloak                       
Healing Frost Cloak                           
5 min Light spell                                 

     SPELLS 
Healing apprentice 
Healing adept
Healing Expert
Healing Master
Flaming Heals Apprentice
Flaming Heals Adept
Flaming Heals Expert
Flaming Heals Master       

See pictures for more details I will add more info in destription if mod get endorsement.

I am going for balance so WIP, let me know if you think a spell is to strong. I also made this for people that play on master and harder difficult so keep that in mind. Also keep in mind in pictures my guy has 90 restoration.

Nice feature is you can use lesser power spells with a shield and sword as a shout power. 


My mod that adds lesser powers, heal spells and more restoration spell. Can be purchased from urag in the college of winterhold.


Install:

1.Unzip
2.copy folder to skyrim folder data folder

Nexus manager should work due the way this is packed. Let me know if not.

Hope you all enjoy.

[color=yellow][u][b]My other mods[/b][/u][/color]
[color=yellow][u][b]Draco1122[/b][/u][/color]
